Type.Name: ColorSelectionChangePaletteFunc

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ColorSelectionChangePaletteFunc(Gdk.Color colors, int n_colors);

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: Delegate to specify function signature for methods that change the color palette in a .
